meanings.definition: A substance or tool used to remove dead skin cells from the surface of the skin.
meanings.sent1: I bought a gentle exfoliator to help my skin feel smoother.
meanings.sent2: She applied the exfoliator to her face to reveal a fresh complexion.
meanings.sent3: The exfoliator worked like a little scrubbing fairy on her skin.
meanings.sent4: The exfoliator was like a magic eraser, wiping away dullness.
meanings.sent5: The exfoliator was a tiny superhero fighting off dead skin villains.

meanings.definition: A cosmetic product designed to promote the shedding of dead skin cells.
meanings.sent1: Her favorite exfoliator had a refreshing scent that she loved.
meanings.sent2: The exfoliator she used was gentle yet effective in revealing radiant skin.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the exfoliator was her secret weapon against dullness.
meanings.sent4: The exfoliator was like a gentle breeze, sweeping away dead skin.
meanings.sent5: The exfoliator was a magical potion that made her skin glow.

meanings.definition: The act of exfoliating or removing dead skin cells from the body.
meanings.sent1: Exfoliating with a good exfoliator can improve skin texture.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the ritual of exfoliator application as part of her skincare routine.
meanings.sent3: The exfoliator dance involved gentle circular motions on the skin.
meanings.sent4: Exfoliating felt like shedding old skin to reveal a new layer underneath.
meanings.sent5: The exfoliator ritual was like a mini spa treatment for her skin.
